mapper.insert: insert into gl_member (mbr_id, mbr_email, mbr_pwd, mbr_nickname, mbr_profile, mbr_banner) values (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profile}, #{banner})
mapper.update: update gl_member set ck_active = false where mbr_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select mbr_no as no, mbr_id as username, mbr_pwd as password, mbr_email as email, mbr_nickname as nickname, mbr_profile as profile, reg_dt as regDate, chg_dt as updateDate, mbr_banner banner, (select count(*) from gl_member_subscribe where mbr_no = #{no}) as subscribeCount from gl_member where mbr_no = #{no}

select mbr_no as no, mbr_id as username, mbr_email as email, mbr_nickname as nickname, mbr_profile as profile, reg_dt as regDate, chg_dt as updateDate, mbr_banner banner, (select count(*) from gl_member_subscribe where mbr_id = #{userId}) as subscribeCount from gl_member where mbr_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update gl_member set mbr_pwd = #{password} where mbr_no = #{no}
mapper.delete: delete from gl_member_subscribe where mbr_no = #{from} and mbr_is_subscribed = #{to}
